summary: A number of individuals in Germany whose lives are connected in some ways, and all of them have dark sides which may shock us to the core.
cast: Christoph Bach|Margit Carstensen|Jakub Gierszal|Corinna Harfouch|Sandra Hüller|Carla Juri|Michael Kranz|Johannes Krisch|Michael Maertens|Dieter Meier|Max Pellny|Sarah Rebellato|Nina Marie Rottmann|Leonard Scheicher|Bernhard Schütz|Ronald Zehrfeld
title: Finsterworld
